1.1.hd_quote: Time is everything. You have to wait for it and there is nothing that you can do.
1.1.behavioral_axis: Waits patiently for creative mutation to emerge naturally, recognizing that timing follows its own law and cannot be forced by willpower
1.1.shadow_axis: Becomes unstable trying to control or force creativity through ego and willpower, leading to distortion and frustration
1.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized.clean chunks

1.2.hd_quote: The required harmony between established values and ideals that enriches inspiration.
1.2.behavioral_axis: Maintains individual expression without interference, living their unique difference while honoring established values and ideals that enrich inspiration
1.2.shadow_axis: Allows ego desires and passions to overtake creative expression, gets pumped up by others and interfered with, losing their unique quality
1.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized.clean chunks

1.3.hd_title: The energy to sustain creative work
1.3.hd_quote: Mars exalted as the symbol of a profound need for self-expression.
1.3.behavioral_axis: Learns from interference through trial and error, adapts while maintaining Martian energy to keep pushing through and sustaining creative work
1.3.shadow_axis: Gets pulled into commercial possibilities and material forces, selling out uniqueness for money and abandoning their mutative creative process
1.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized.clean chunks

1.4.hd_title: Aloneness as the medium of creativity
1.4.hd_quote: The tension of inner light. Creativity must develop outside of influence.
1.4.behavioral_axis: Protects creative aloneness in a one-tracked way, building inner tension over a lifetime while recognizing that creativity cannot be interfered with
1.4.shadow_axis: Becomes fixed on externalizing the mutation once created, abandoning further creativity to market and promote, losing creative feel
1.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized.clean chunks

1.5.hd_quote: Mars exalted for its powerful ego endurance.
1.5.behavioral_axis: Endures society's projection of creative talent with ego strength, attracting society and potentially getting mutation out into the world
1.5.shadow_axis: Plays the creative role through eccentricity rather than depth, becoming more eccentric to get attention until the game crashes as a has-been
1.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized.clean chunks

1.6.hd_quote: Clear assessment of creative value. This is something that can only be judged in time.
1.6.behavioral_axis: Sits on the roof observing creative impulses objectively, recognizing that mutation's value transcends generations and can only be assessed across time
1.6.shadow_axis: Falls into subjective appraisal early in life, calling things beautiful that are merely fads, leading to disappointment and creative frustration
1.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized.clean chunks
